entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing late this evening and dissipating before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:20 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
